page.title: 04MY DAY AT A SECONDARY SCHOOL
page.content: I am 12 years old and go to Wall- ington High School for Boys. At 8 a.m. I leave home, and arrive at school half an hour later. After our form master has marked the register we go to the Hall for Assembly - a hymn, reading from the Bible, and prayers. English is our first lesson today and goes quickly. Then we have French, followed by Science and then a break of 15 minutes to play outside. We cont- inue Science experiments, have one more lesson (Geography), and then it is time for lunch - I am famished! After lunch is Music (learning to play the recorder), then Maths, and lastly my favourite Classical Studies where we learn about the Greek gods. School finishes at 3.45 unless there is a games practice for rugby or cricket.We usually have an hour's home- work, and then my time is my own.
